verses.roman:
paramānanda purī-saṅge sannyāsīra gaṇa
eka-dike vaise saba karite bhojana

synonyms: paramānanda purī-saṅge—with Paramānanda Purī; sannyāsīra gaṇa—all the sannyāsī associates of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; eka-dike—on one side; vaise—sat down; saba—all; karite bhojana—to accept the prasāda.
translation: All the sannyāsī associates of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu headed by Paramānanda Purī, sat on one side and thus partook of the prasāda.
